, May 19 ( UPI ) -- A Republican state representative in Florida is criticizing changes his state is making to its standardized testing , saying they are an attempt to turn straight children homosexual .
Video of Florida State Rep. Charles Van Zant 's anti-gay comments were leaked by watchdog group ThinkProgress Monday afternoon .

RelatedSentence: The remarks were part of a speech Van Zant gave at the Operation Education Conference , an anti-Common Core gathering in Orlando .
